product_description: Crescent adjustable smooth jaw Monkey wrenches are designed for geometric fasteners with a cosmetic finish. Smooth, large capacity jaws prevent damage to fittings from traditional toothed jaws, and the large knurl allows for easy adjustment and a tight jaw fit.

name: Drop Forged 2 Piece (12", 18 ") Pipe Wrench Set: Heavy Duty Hand Tools with Adjustable Plumbing Wrench, Exceed GGG standard
short_description: Heavy Duty: Premium quality drop-forged jaws made of carbon steel drop-forged steel, they are extremely hard to prevent deformation or breakage and ensure that they always bite into the pipe.

Strong Grip: The non-slip serrated jaw design and adjustable nut provide a strong grip that makes the wrench perfect for tightening and loosening all forms of threaded pipes, allowing you to complete a variety of repair jobs with ease.
Forged Handles: Standard handle length, work-shaped design features a wide gripping surface, rust and oxidation resistance, high torque and toughness for improved comfort and one-handed operation.
Convenient Storage: A hole in the bottom of the handle makes it easy for the operator to hang on a hook or pegboard for quick access and is safely packed by carton box.

Ideal for all plumbing related home improvement maintenance such as tank maintenance, household plumbing, vehicle maintenance, etc. Provides a sure grip around smooth, round surfaces such as showerheads or bathroom sinks and drains.

The non-slip serrated jaw design and adjustable nut provide a firm grip. name: MAXPOWER Swedish Pipe Wrench, 16 1/2-Inch Adjustable Swedish Pipe Spanner Plumbers Wrench with 90°Angled Jaw, Jaw MAX Opening Capacity 2.75"
short_description: Corner Pipe Wrench: 90°Angled jaw locks pliers. Max jaw opening 2.75"(70 mm) Pipe clamping dia up to 2". Overall length 16.5" (420 mm). Weight 1.1 Kg

90°Angled Slim Jaw: Swedish-type pipe wrench features slim head allows to access tight spaces and corners. Ideal for front-end alignment, tie rods, and plumbing fittings. Recommended for plumbers and homeowners

Range of Clamping: Water pump pliers with 90 degree jaw, suited for gripping square objects (e.g. a hex nut), the straight jaws have the advantage of wider opening, and gripping objects with parallel forces
Adjustable Pipe Wrench: The clamping width can be individually adjusted with the undetachable adjusting nut. The round thread is very resistant to mechanical damage and dirt
Self-Locking: This plumber wrench has self-locking teeth that grip firmly with high turning resistance even on smooth surfaces, it is not necessary to actively press the wrench together

name: Adjustable Wrench Quick Multi-Function Spanner Power Grip Pipe Wrench Set 2 Pack compatible with 14-60mm Pipes Nuts Screws
short_description: 【Self-locking Design】——Use self-locking function with Built-in automatic locking spring, easily operated with one hand, simple and practical, improve efficiency
【Superior Grip】--Forged jaws with double threads teeth can grab the pipe or nuts firmly, anti-slip and quick adjustments, easy to use, save your time and energy.
【Compatiblity】——Clamping range from 14-30mm for 10.25 inch wrench, Clamping range from 30-60mm for the 15 inch wrench, widely use on pipe, screw, nut and so on.

【Multifunction Handle】——Ergonomic handle keeps the user's wrist in a comfortable position to reduce strain. The hardened tail made of carbon steel can be used for prying or chiseling, good assistant for home travel.

name: Toolwiz Rubber Strap Wrench Upgrade-2pcs Set 24 IN and 19.7 IN Length Adjustable Oil Filter Strap Wrench, Reinforced Rubber Pipe Wrench, Jar Opener for Mechanics Plumbers DIY
short_description: Upgrade Powerful Materials: Toolwiz adjustable wrench is made of a strong reinforced, thick rubber strap, with more wires backing the rubber strap wrench set to enhance strength to protect the strap wrench from breaking easily, making it more durable.

Widely Used: Rubber strap wrench can be used in many fields such as automotive, agriculture, tractors, oil filter removal, glue joints, shower heads, fuel filters, jar opener, can lid, PVC junctions, bottles, faucets, water filters, sinks, taps and so on.

Wrenches Set : Large Wrench is adjustable up to 6"/150mm diameter, while the small rubber strap wrench is adjustable up to 4"/100mm diameter. Adjustable wrench set can be a very useful tool for most applications: oil filter removal tool wrench, strap wrench plumbing wrench, water filter wrench, lid opener jar opener, kitchen strap wrench, faucet wrench, plumbers wrench, pipe wrench set, or a shower head wrench

Ergonomic Handle Design: Toolwiz belt wrench is designed with an ergonomic handle, and a non-slip grip which ensures you a firm and comfortable grip at any time, saves labor and improves working efficiency. Perfect for arthritic hands, seniors with arthritis, weak wrists, plumbers, mechanics, oil filter, and more.

Attention: The small adjustable wrench is not suitable for oil filter removal and big items such as drain pipes, and water filters. It is suitable as a jar opener for weak hands, bottle opener, lid opener.

Tips for use: To loosen the target, pull the belt to adjust the diameter as needed. To avoid slipping, tighten the belt properly to the target and grab the rest belt with your hand. Along the arrow(near the Toolwiz) to guide the direction of force. The operation direction is to turn to the anti-skid groove. To tighten the target, flip the wrench and do the same as loosening the target.

name: Universal Adjustable Wrench Multi-function Magic Quick Self-Adjusting Monkey Wrenches Set 10 and 15-Inch, Pipe Wrench Spanner 0.6”-2.4”/14mm-60mm - 2 Piece
short_description: 【Superior Strength】These adjustable wrenches are made of high quality steel, highly processed and hardened. Forged steel handle, rust - proof. Made by quenching and forging, the hardness can reach HRC 48-52, effectively prolong the service life.

【Wide Applications】These monkey wrench spanner is easy to use and enhance productivity, one hand operation due to self-locking function of the magic wrenches. Top-quality hand pluming tools for every repair project.

【Great Size Match】Two sizes of pipe vise wrenches include. 10” wrench with jaw capacity of 0.55”-1.18” , 15” wrench with a jaw capacity of 1.18”-2.36” , work well with different nuts like prism, square, diamond nut, etc.

【Excellent Design】The TPR ergonomic non-slip handle of self adjusting pipe wrench secures your grip, reduce work pressure, less fatigue. The crowbar design hardened tail can be used for prying or chiseling.

【Home Essentials】Water pipe wrenches are the solution to your problems with taps, valves, pipes and piping,radiators boilers,wheels. Tapered Crowbar Design at the end of the handle make the wrench more useful.

name: Pipe Wrench Set, 10” and 15” Self Adjusting Wrench 2-Piece Plumbing Tools - Pipe Vise Wrench Basin Wrench for 0.55“-2.48”/14-60mm Standard Nuts, Irregular Nuts, Pipes Use
short_description: 【PIPE WRENCH SET】Self adjusting pipe wrench 10 inch adjustable wrench features 0.55-1.55 inch jaw open, 15 inch adjustable wrench features 1.18-2.48 inch jaw open.The clamping range of 2 universal pipe vise wrenches can cover 0.55-2.48 inches adjustable wrench

【SELF ADJUSTING PIPE WRENCH】The self adjusting pipe wrench has a built-in spring self-adjusting design. Applying force in one direction causes the wrench to tighten, while applying force in the opposite direction triggers sliding and subsequent readjustment. It can be operated with one hand, which can achieve one-handed operation and easy to use

【THREE-SIDED ANTI-SLIP TEETH】The pipe vise wrench three-sided tooth design ensures a tight bite, which can be firmly locked on nuts, pipes and round tubes of different sizes, which can greatly improve the work efficiency of fixing and unscrewing. Wide range of use

【HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS】The plumbing wrench is made of heavy-duty high-carbon steel and processed by heat treatment to improve its hardness and durability. At the same time, the pipe clamp is plated for better rust resistance.

【ERGONOMIC GRIP】The self locking wrench with soft TPR material handle and ergonomic design provides extra comfort and reduces manual fatigue. The crowbar design at the tail can easily handle prying work, solving various problems

name: toolant 7-INCH Plier Wrench, CR-V Construction Adjustable Wrench With Pouch, Black Finish Smooth Jaw Pliers, Parallel Jaws with Comfortable Grips, Suitable for All Types of Nuts, Water Pipes, etc
short_description: CR-V Steel Drop Forged: The toolant plier wrench is crafted from CR-V steel which ensures superior strength and durability and zinc phosphate surface treatment for greater corrosion resistance
Wide Jaw Range: Maximum Jaw Capacity 1-1/2" 40MM, which is suitable for screwing nuts and pipes and breaking iron blocks, one tool to help you get a lot of work done

Labor-Saving Design: 10:1 Lever design helps you use less effort to complete each job; The curvature of the handle matches the natural curvature of the hand, and the ergonomic design reduces the burden on the hand and wrist during use

Quick & Self-Adjusting Jaw: Push lock button to quickly adjust the opening size by means of the groove lock mechanism and lift handle to quickly adjust the jaw position by gripping and unclenching the handles without having to reposition after each turn
Parallel Jaws: The pliers wrench features parallel smooth jaws that provide a secure and stable grip on fasteners which minimize the risk of rounding and increase efficiency

name: DURATECH 10-Inch Adjustable Wrench, Wide Jaw Opening Black Oxide Finish Plumbing Wrench, CR-V Steel, SAE and Metric Scale Marked, Ergonomic Grip
short_description: Wide Jaw Opening: Max jaw opening up tp 2-1/32 inch (52 mm) for 10-Inch wrench. Greater jaw capacity, allows 55% wider opening than traditional adjustable wrenches, fits a wide range of fastener sizes, supports larger nuts, bolts, and pipes
Heat Treated CR-V Steel: Drop forged CR-V steel, heat-treated, increase hardness and toughness. Black oxide finish on the surface help to resist rust for better durability
Laser Marking With High Precision: High accurate scale, SAE & Metric, allow for exact fastener fit. Mirror polish for the head of wrench, make the surface scale clearer, convenient to work
Special Jaws and Non-slip Grip: Super thin and long jaw give greater access in limited and narrow spaces. Our adjustable wrenches with textured rubber grip handle for superior comfort and control
Universal Wrench: Suitable for tube/nut disassembly and assembly of various equipment, car, bicycle at home. Ideal for plumbers, electricians and maintainers
